description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.7M
  in 2018-2019 on contracts with Best Facilities Services. The average
  contract duration was 5.01 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $13.7M. The longest
  contract was 5.01 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $13.7M.
